languages.text: "Тем, кто не верит, не понять истины и не спастись!" {n}Старик упрямится — но вы чувствуете, что его голос звучит уже менее уверенно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Тем, кто не верит, не понять истины и не спастись!" {n}Старик упрямится — но вы чувствуете, что его голос звучит уже менее уверенно.{/n}

languages.text: "Those who lack faith cannot grasp the truth and will not be saved!" {n}The old man is obstinate, but you sense that the confidence in his voice has diminished.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Тем, кто не верит, не понять истины и не спастись!" {n}Старик упрямится — но вы чувствуете, что его голос звучит уже менее уверенно.{/n}

"Those who lack faith cannot grasp the truth and will not be saved!" {n}The old man is obstinate, but you sense that the confidence in his voice has diminished.{/n}

"Those who lack faith cannot grasp the truth and will not be saved!" {n}The old man is obstinate, but you sense that the confidence in his voice has diminished.{/n}

languages.text: "Wem der Glaube fehlt, der kann die Wahrheit nicht erkennen und der wird nicht gerettet!" {n}Der alte Mann ist stur, doch du spürst, dass das Selbstvertrauen in seiner Stimme nachgelassen hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Those who lack faith cannot grasp the truth and will not be saved!" {n}The old man is obstinate, but you sense that the confidence in his voice has diminished.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wem der Glaube fehlt, der kann die Wahrheit nicht erkennen und der wird nicht gerettet!" {n}Der alte Mann ist stur, doch du spürst, dass das Selbstvertrauen in seiner Stimme nachgelassen hat.{/n}

languages.text: « Ceux qui n'ont pas la foi ne peuvent pas saisir la vérité et ne seront pas sauvés ! » {n}s'écrie le vieillard avec obstination, mais vous entendez à sa voix que sa confiance vacille.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Those who lack faith cannot grasp the truth and will not be saved!" {n}The old man is obstinate, but you sense that the confidence in his voice has diminished.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ceux qui n'ont pas la foi ne peuvent pas saisir la vérité et ne seront pas sauvés ! » {n}s'écrie le vieillard avec obstination, mais vous entendez à sa voix que sa confiance vacille.{/n}

languages.text: “无法理解真理的无信之人是无法得救的！”{n}老人依旧很固执，但你察觉到，他的声音中少了一分自信。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Those who lack faith cannot grasp the truth and will not be saved!" {n}The old man is obstinate, but you sense that the confidence in his voice has diminished.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “无法理解真理的无信之人是无法得救的！”{n}老人依旧很固执，但你察觉到，他的声音中少了一分自信。{/n}

languages.text: 「信仰を欠いた者は真実を理解せず、救われない！」 {n}老人は頑固だが、彼の声に自信が失われているのを感じた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Those who lack faith cannot grasp the truth and will not be saved!" {n}The old man is obstinate, but you sense that the confidence in his voice has diminished.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「信仰を欠いた者は真実を理解せず、救われない！」 {n}老人は頑固だが、彼の声に自信が失われているのを感じた。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Los que carecen de fe no pueden comprender la verdad y no se salvarán!». {n}El viejo es obstinado, pero percibes que la confianza en su voz ha disminuido.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Those who lack faith cannot grasp the truth and will not be saved!" {n}The old man is obstinate, but you sense that the confidence in his voice has diminished.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Los que carecen de fe no pueden comprender la verdad y no se salvarán!». {n}El viejo es obstinado, pero percibes que la confianza en su voz ha disminuido.{/n}

languages.text: "İmandan yoksun olanlar ne hakikati görebilir ne de kurtuluşa erebilir!" {n}Yaşlı adam inatçı olsa da sesindeki öz güvenin azaldığını hissediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Those who lack faith cannot grasp the truth and will not be saved!" {n}The old man is obstinate, but you sense that the confidence in his voice has diminished.{/n}
